ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai built a simulation accessible through a projection pool.
During the first practical test, three Nomai became trapped inside the projection. To find the exit, they went to the middlepoint between the three Anchors.
A Nomai named Melina was bothered by the predictable nature of the projection, noting that knowing everything of an enviroment contradicts the Nomai's curiosity.
A Nomai named Calad was bothered by the lack of nature within the projection. Another Nomai noted that knowing the nature was simulated would defeat the purpose of adding it.
A Nomai named Primm was bothered by the artificiality of the projection, noting it seemed like "an attempt by someone to recreate their structures without understanding why they were built."
The projection is procedurally generated from the knowledge of whoever is inside it.
I found a Stranger-styled area below the Nomai structures.
I found a projection stone that allows me to return.
The Nomai concluded they wouldn't finish this project, as they considered it to go against Nomai philosophy.
